title: A 1-year Costco Gold Star Membership is now only $60 and comes with a $40 Digital Costco Shop Card*
content:
Macworld

As the holidays wind down, you may wonder how to keep your grocery budget in check and shop for products of all varieties in one place. The answer? Costco.

Thanks to this end-of-year discount, you can now grab a 1-Year Costco Gold Star Membership for only $60 through January 1. You’ll even receive a $40 Digital Costco Shop Card* with your purchase!

With over 500 warehouses nationwide, you can easily find a Costco near you and discover incredible value on all sorts of products, including produce, Apple gear, furniture, appliances, and much more. You can even find products from Kirkland Signature™, Dyson, KitchenAid, and more with a Costco Gold Star Membership.

Finding great value isn’t limited to in-person shopping. Costco Gold Star members can also enjoy online shopping with same-day or two-day delivery. There are even additional members-only benefits, including access to the Costco Tire Center, Costco Gas Station, and Costco Services.

Ahead of 2024, grab a 1-Year Costco Gold Star Membership with a $40 Digital Costco Shop Card* for just $60. No coupon is required, but this offer ends January 1 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific.

 

Costco 1-Year Gold Star Membership + $40 Digital Costco Shop Card*

Only $60 through Macworld

Prices subject to change.

*Services are provided to Costco members by third parties. 

*To receive a Digital Costco Shop Card, you must provide a valid email address at the time of sign-up. If you elect not to provide a valid email address, a Digital Costco Shop Card will not be emailed. Valid only for nonmembers for their first year of membership. Limit one per household. Nontransferable and may not be combined with any other promotion. New members will receive their Digital Costco Shop Card by email within 2 weeks of sign-up. Costco Shop Cards are not redeemable for cash, except as required by law. Digital Costco Shop Cards are not accepted at Gas Stations, Car Washes, or Food Court Kiosks. A Costco membership is $60 a year. An Executive Membership is an additional $60 upgrade fee a year. Each membership includes one free Household Card. May be subject to sales tax. Costco accepts all Visa cards, as well as cash, checks, debit/ATM cards, EBT and Costco Shop Cards. Departments and product selection may vary.

Accessories
